name: Slenderman Warehouse
description:
You Entered A Warehouse. You Brought Your Camera. Collect 8 Pages To Get Out Of Here. But Something Is In Here

Slenderman Will Try To Kill You So Hide And Look Away From Slender. or else he will kill you

Slender Man is a fictional supernatural character that originated as a creepypasta Internet meme created by Something Awful forum user Eric Knudsen in 2009. He is depicted as a thin, unnaturally tall humanoid with a featureless head and face, wearing a black suit

Slenderman Is a tall humanoid creature in a black or grey suit, red or black tie, and white shirt. His face is totally white, completely devoid of facial features. He has no hair, and generally has normal-looking bare hands, albeit with fingers longer and bonier than a typical human. Slender Man has been depicted in imagery and literature at anywhere between 6 and 15 feet tall, depending on the situation, though in video he is usually only around 6-7 feet tall

*THE GAME IS BASED  ON SLENDER THE 8 PAGES*
